{
  "name": "sample-elastic-search1",
  "templates": [
    {
  "name": "sample-elastic-search1",
  "templates": [
    {
      "security": {
        "elasticPassword": "Test@123",
        "enabled": true,
        "tls": {
          "autoGenerated": false
        }
      },
      "replicaCount": {
        "master": 1,
        "data": 2
      },
      "ingress": {
        "enabled": true,
        "className": "nginx",
        "hostSuffix": "machinehack-new.clients.kloudlite.io"
      }
    }
  ]
}
  ]
}












































{
  "name": "sample-mariadb",
  "templates": [
    {
      "template": "mariadb",
      "values": {
        "global": {
          "imageRegistry": "",
          "imagePullSecrets": [],
          "defaultStorageClass": "",
          "security": {
            "allowInsecureImages": false
          },
          "compatibility": {
            "openshift": {
              "adaptSecurityContext": "auto"
            }
          }
        },
        "architecture": "standalone",
        "auth": {
          "rootPassword": "",
          "database": "my_database",
          "username": "",
          "password": "",
          "replicationUser": "replicator",
          "replicationPassword": "",
          "existingSecret": "",
          "forcePassword": false,
          "usePasswordFiles": false
        },
        "tls": {
          "enabled": false,
          "existingSecret": "",
          "certFilename": "tls.crt",
          "certKeyFilename": "tls.key",
          "autoGenerated": {
            "enabled": true,
            "engine": "helm",
            "certManager": {
              "existingIssuer": "",
              "existingIssuerKind": "",
              "keySize": 2048,
              "keyAlgorithm": "RSA",
              "duration": "2160h",
              "renewBefore": "360h"
            }
          }
        },
        "primary": {
          "name": "primary",
          "containerPorts": {
            "mysql": 3306
          },
          "configuration": "[mysqld]\nskip-name-resolve\nexplicit_defaults_for_timestamp\nbasedir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb\ndatadir=/bitnami/mariadb/data\nport={{ .Values.primary.containerPorts.mysql }}\nsocket=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysql.sock\ntmpdir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp\nmax_allowed_packet=16M\nbind-address=*\npid-file=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysqld.pid\nlog-error=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/logs/mysqld.log\ncharacter-set-server=UTF8\ncollation-server=utf8_general_ci\nslow_query_log=0\nlong_query_time=10.0\nbinlog_expire_logs_seconds=2592000",
          "persistence": {
            "enabled": true,
            "storageClass": "",
            "accessModes": ["ReadWriteOnce"],
            "size": "8Gi"
          },
          "service": {
            "type": "ClusterIP",
            "ports": {
              "mysql": 3306,
              "metrics": 9104
            },
            "annotations": {}
          }
        },
        "secondary": {
          "name": "secondary",
          "replicaCount": 1,
          "containerPorts": {
            "mysql": 3306
          },
          "configuration": "[mysqld]\nskip-name-resolve\nexplicit_defaults_for_timestamp\nbasedir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb\ndatadir=/bitnami/mariadb/data\nport={{ .Values.secondary.containerPorts.mysql }}\nsocket=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysql.sock\ntmpdir=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp\nmax_allowed_packet=16M\nbind-address=0.0.0.0\npid-file=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/tmp/mysqld.pid\nlog-error=/opt/bitnami/mariadb/logs/mysqld.log\ncharacter-set-server=UTF8\ncollation-server=utf8_general_ci\nslow_query_log=0\nlong_query_time=10.0\nbinlog_expire_logs_seconds=2592000",
          "persistence": {
            "enabled": true,
            "storageClass": "",
            "accessModes": ["ReadWriteOnce"],
            "size": "8Gi"
          },
          "service": {
            "type": "ClusterIP",
            "ports": {
              "mysql": 3306,
              "metrics": 9104
            },
            "annotations": {}
          }
        },
        "metrics": {
          "enabled": false,
          "annotations": {
            "prometheus.io/scrape": "true",
            "prometheus.io/port": "9104"
          },
          "serviceMonitor": {
            "enabled": false
          }
        },
        "networkPolicy": {
          "enabled": true,
          "allowExternal": true,
          "allowExternalEgress": true
        },
        "volumePermissions": {
          "enabled": false
        }
      }
    }
  ]
}




{
  "name": "sample-playground",
  "templates": [
    {
      "template": "playground",
      "values": {
        "codeServer": {
            "ingress": {
                "enabled": true,
                "className": "nginx",
                "clusterIssuer": "kloudlite-cert-issuer",
                "host": "sample.machinehack-new.clients.kloudlite.io"
              }
          }
      }
    }
  ]
}
